name: The Philippines
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Philippines to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: You must shatter the vase to spread its perfume, and smite the rock to get the spark!
attacked: We are not sleeping, we are waiting for you with a burning heart and an armed fist!
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of the Philippines! We wish for peace...
hateHello: You hear the thunder? Your upcoming fate!?
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?

name: Ukraine
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Ukraine to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
attacked: The world sees you as an evil invader! We shall push you through the Urals!
defeated: Ukraine may have been destroyed, but our spirits remain.
hateHello: Ти що, жартуєш зараз, стара дурню?
tradeRequest: How would you like it if I propose this kind of exchange?

name: Iraq
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Iraq to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: We have called a war on you, our soldiers want blood!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: The wars are over... May we have a lasting peace.
introduction: Welcome to the Republic of Iraq.
tradeRequest: It appears that you do have a reason for existing – to make this deal with me.

name: Morocco
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead Morocco to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: It has to be done, What we'll achieve from this will be worth it in the end.
attacked: Look at yourself, declaring war on us! This war won't solve anything...
defeated: The gain is having a clean system from corruption.
introduction: Welcome to the Kingdom of Morocco, friend!
tradeRequest: Come, I'm sure this will benefit us. ...and you.

name: New Zealand
startIntroPart1: As the cold war comes to an end, a new century begins to rise. Now we may look forward to a new time of potential peace and harmony, through to an unknown future...
startIntroPart2: It is now your time to lead us to this new future. Will you lead New Zealand to a peaceful future, or a great conquest? Will you lead to economic prosperity or cultural dominance? You shall decide...
declaringWar: You chose the path of war! Your cities will be nothing but ruin, and your nation will completly collapsed!
attacked: Look at the big civ leader over there with the war declaration! Great job, mate. Really shows off how hard you are.
defeated: I have done my utmost, but your strength was greater. My heart, at least, will beat undefeated.
introduction: Welcome to Aotearoa, New Zealand! Have you come to learn of our Māori culture?
tradeRequest: Come, I'm sure this will benefit us. ...and you.

name: Marshall Islands
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: It was great while it lasted...

name: Samoa
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: It was great while it lasted...

name: Uzbekistan
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We have fallen, rule with mercy.
